a.title: April 30, 2020 regular mtg agenda notice, FPSB complex
a.span: April 30, 2020 regular mtg agenda notice, FPSB complex

div.a: FRANKLIN PARISH SCHOOLS WILL BE CLOSED UNTIL APRIL 30

div.div: Due to the governor’s proclamation, Franklin Parish School Board office will be closed until further notice. You may call the office on Tuesday or Thursday between the hours of 9 a.m.- 12 p.m. at 318-435-9046.
The provisions for grab and go lunches for Franklin Parish students will be postponed after Tuesday, March 24. Click for Message from Superintendent
Click here for info by school, as well as, a list of free websites that your students can utilize to continue learning at home.

br.h1: MAP TO FRANKLIN PARISH SCHOOL BOARD
